p: There is a wide range of definitions for HOS in the literature. Most authors refer to the cumulative stoma output within 24 h as a diagnostic criterion. Previous literature refers to different stoma output values such as >1,500 mL per day ( 5), >2,000 mL per day ( 1), at least once >2,000 mL/day, but >1,000 mL/day for at least 3 days ( 4) or 2,000 mL/day for at least 3 days ( 6, 7).
